title: U.S. economy grew at a 2.8% pace in the second quarter, much more than expected

title: How Visa employed artificial intelligence to check $40 billion in fraud as scammers also take to AI
content: The payments giant said it prevented $40 billion worth of fraudulent transactions from October 2022 to September 2023, nearly double from a year ago.
summary: The payments giant said it prevented $40 billion worth of fraudulent transactions from October 2022 to September 2023, nearly double from a year ago.

title: Most Asia-Pacific markets rebound after sell-off as investors assess Tokyo CPI, await U.S. inflation data

title: $1 million hypothetical portfolios: How kids from wealthy families at an elite Swiss school learn about money

title: Philippines battles to contain oil spill as tanker sinks, leaving one dead

title: Ford shares post worst day since 2008, leading autos rout after company's disappointing earnings
content: Ford closed Thursday at $11.16, down by 18.4% — marking the stock's worst daily decline since 2008 and the second-worst performer of S&P 500 companies.

title: Revolut clinches UK banking license, ending three-year wait

title: Coinbase UK unit fined $4.5 million by British regulator over 'high-risk' customer breaches
